\w gather|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w* \w thereof|strong="H3802"\w* into \w it|strong="H2896"\w*, even \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w piece|strong="H5409"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*, \w and|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*; \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w it|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w choice|strong="H4005"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

\w Heap|strong="H7235"\w* \w on|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w make|strong="H8552"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w fire|strong="H1814"\w* hot, \w boil|strong="H8552"\w* \w well|strong="H4841"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w make|strong="H8552"\w* thick \w the|strong="H7235"\w* broth, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* let \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4616"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w empty|strong="H7386"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w thereof|strong="H8432"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H5178"\w* be \w hot|strong="H3179"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* \w thereof|strong="H8432"\w* \w may|strong="H5178"\w* \w burn|strong="H2787"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H5178"\w* be \w molten|strong="H5413"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rust|strong="H2457"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H5178"\w* be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w* \add herself\add* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w toil|strong="H8383"\w*; \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w rust|strong="H2457"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w*; \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w rust|strong="H2457"\w* \add goeth not forth\add* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* fire.

\w In|strong="H5750"\w* thy \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* \w is|strong="H2932"\w* \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w*: \w because|strong="H3282"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3282"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* thee \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* wast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*, \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* thy \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* \w anymore|strong="H5750"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3282"\w* caused \w my|strong="H5117"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w toward|strong="H5704"\w* thee \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.

Sigh, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* aloud, \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* mourning \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*; \w bind|strong="H2280"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* headtire \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* \w lips|strong="H8222"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w*.
